text: He manisaharu! E'uta drstanta varnana garincha, tyasala'i dhyanapurvaka suna, ki timile allaha baheka jasa jasala'i pukardachau, tiniharule e'uta jhinga pani bana'una sakdainan. Yadyapi tyasako nimti sabai ekatrita bha'ihalun ra yadi jhingale uniharusita kunai kura khosera li'era jancha bhane tyasabata tiniharule tyasala'i choda'una pani sakdainan. Jo yacaka cha u pani asamartha cha ra jasabata (tiniharule) yacana gardachan u pani asahaya cha
